column4: hi there is there a ADDON CD for breezy 5.10 like there was for 5.04
If you have a reasonably fast network connection, I don't think you'd need any add-on media. ;-) Just pull in what you need with apt-get.
I had been trying to do that i went to the forums and have been adding packages the add on CD was cooler for me but I am trying thanks...
Just log out. Then click the 'Session' button just below the login widget when logging in to start in Xfce4.
